channel.description: Recent content in tvheadend on linux dot net dot pk

item.title: TVHeadend
item.description: I have recently moved back to Pakistan and was pretty pissed off when I used the PTCL Smart TV STB – looked around for a solution and found a wonderful project called “TVHeadend[1]” – which not only takes IPTV multicast streams and converts them to HTTP Unicast but also does the same process for DVB-S , T & SAT/ SATIP. Expect some interesting articles about TVHeadend soon! Cheers [1]http://tvheadend.org
